The boy with the lightning scar who goes to wizard school
The total biological change from a caterpillar into a winged bug

A trick of the eye that makes you see something that isn't real

An act of rising up against those who are in power
An intense, driving feeling or conviction for a person or hobby
Using humor or irony to mock political leaders or society
Speaking in a very low, quiet voice so others can't overhear
The path or fate that is meant to happen in your life
Complete and total disorder or confusion without any rules
When large groups of birds or people move to a new region
A solemn and serious promise made to do something
A quiet, thoughtful sadness that seems to have no cause
The dark area that follows you around in the sunlight
Being totally consumed by a single idea or person nearby
The brain's ability to store and recall past experiences
Deliberately destroying something to prevent it from working
The loud rattling sound someone makes when they sleep
The pop star with a massive following called Swifties
